entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Delta
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Blowing snow early this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this morning then becoming light this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
